body:
In a spack environment I included a compiler definition and used the microarchitecture target broadwell and spack was unable to find it.  Replacing it with x86_64 allowed it to work.  Seems like the target cannot be a specific microarchitecture.


### Steps to reproduce the issue

create an environment, add a compiler block, and use a target=broadwell

### Error Message

Spack will fail to find the compiler

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. LLNL LC pascal
title: Spack compilers are not found when target architecture is microarchitecture
